entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023
